title: January Challenges feat. Matt McConkey
itunes:title: January Challenges feat. Matt McConkey
description:
Everyone has their own challenge to start off the new year – maybe a diet, a bout of sobriety, or a new gym membership. Here on Add to Cart, a show about shopping (amongst other things), SuChin is in fact challenging herself not to shop. Plus, Kulap invites podcast host, writer, actor, and friend Matt McConkey to start another ATC Challenge: The SolaWave Challenge. 

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • Listen to Matt McConkey’s podcast, Homophilia
  • SolaWave wand + serum
  • Ku’s sports bra
  • Dermstore Skinceutical’s

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
